dublin_core.dcvalue: CommCare is Dimagiâ€™s open source mobile health platform used to facilitate the work of Sahiyas by enabling easy electronic data collection, remote monitoring and supervision, decision support, and counselling messages.
CommCare Mobile Job Aid for Sahiyas
Rushika Shekhar, Senior Field Manager, Dimagi, Email: rshekhar@dimagi.com
